index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF LICENSES AND CONSUMER AFFAIRS
references: Amends: Ord 106058, 106295; Related: Ord 72630, Ord 62662, Ord 94465, Ord 72495
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Refund Account in the General Fund; amending Section 1 of Ordinance 106058 to provide for refunds of filing fees paid to the City's Hearing Examiner.
